msg: since NEWSLETTER type marketing emails do not create unique communication events, added fields to keep track of party/message ID for these messages

author: regisxu

author: wrowe
msg: Here's the simpler solution to the two groups of mappers/ modules...
The mod_so and mod_watchdog are truly not mappers/ at all.  Very open
to better names than modules/core/ but these are clearly API's which
are to be consumed by the httpd core, or generically, any module.
